definition: to put/to place/to release/to free/to let go/to let out/to set off (fireworks)
flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]

sentences.english: Let me smooth your collar back, it's sticking out again.
sentences.chinese: 让我把你的领子给你放平，又竖起来了。

sentences.english: The youngster has flaming red hair that refuses to lie flat.
sentences.chinese: 这位年轻人有火红的头发不肯放平。

sentences.english: The soldiers couched their rifles and prepared to charge.
sentences.chinese: 士兵们将步枪放平准备冲锋。

sentences.english: Then straightening upper body up, setting heel plane, lifting leg point.
sentences.chinese: 然后直起上身，放平脚跟，抬起腿尖。

sentences.english: Get the putter square. Put the putter flat.
sentences.chinese: 先将推杆方正地设定好，杆头放平。

sentences.english: Slowly the body flat and continue to action do 20 times.
sentences.chinese: 慢慢将身体放平，继续动作做20次。

sentences.english: Place the tortillas on a work surface and spread each generously with the sauce mixture(Step 1).
sentences.chinese: 将薄烙饼放平并涂上步骤1的混合酱。

sentences.english: Give head, stop breathe, get up, check your weave.
sentences.chinese: 把头放平，屏住呼吸，起来，让头发碰到膝盖。

sentences.english: Place the left denim sole piece on to a flat surface, right side down.
sentences.chinese: 将左脚牛仔布鞋底放平，正面向下。

sentences.english: But Norwich were to inflict more frights.
sentences.chinese: 但是诺维奇这种放平心态更像是恐惧。

sentences.english: So the hands flat now in a shoulder's width.
sentences.chinese: 因此，当手与肩宽时，放平手掌。

sentences.english: Tip of toe setting plane, abdominal muscle relaxing, upper body standing.
sentences.chinese: 脚尖放平，腹肌放松，上身立起。

definition: to press down/to crush down/to restrain (anger)/to keep down (voice)
to draw together/to place side by side (e.g. one's fingers, two halves of a torn sheet of paper etc)
vertical/to erect/to set upright/vertical stroke in Chinese characters/young servant (old)
